linkSkill.desc: While you are in combat state, you gain a stacking %Damage buff

build: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/mystic-leap.png} tip={Mystic Leap}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/mystic-arts-mastery.png} tip={Mystic Arts Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/spell-bullets.png} tip={Spell Bullets}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/basic-charge-drive.png} tip={Basic Charge Drive}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/ominous-nightmare.png} tip={Ominous Nightmare}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/initiate-fusion.png} tip={Initiate Fusion}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/knuckle-mastery.png} tip={Knuckle Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/knuckle-booster.png} tip={Knuckle Booster}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/scarlet-charge-drive.png} tip={Scarlet Charge Drive}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/impending-death.png} tip={Impending Death}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/unstoppable-impulse.png} tip={Unstoppable Impulse}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/advanced-fusion.png} tip={Advanced Fusion}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/mystic-arts-training.png} tip={Mystic Arts Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/innate-arts-training.png} tip={Innate Arts Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/vivid-nightmare.png} tip={Vivid Nightmare}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/gust-charge-drive.png} tip={Gust Charge Drive}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/vengeful-hate.png} tip={Vengeful Hate}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/creeping-terror.png} tip={Creeping Terror}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/battle-frenzy.png} tip={Battle Frenzy}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/complete-fusion.png} tip={Complete Fusion}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/advanced-mystic-arts.png} tip={Advanced Mystic Arts}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/advanced-innate-arts.png} tip={Advanced Innate Arts}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/knuckle-expert.png} tip={Knuckle Expert}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/hero-of-the-flora.png} tip={Hero of the Flora}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/endless-nightmare.png} tip={Endless Nightmare}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/abyssal-charge-drive.png} tip={Abyssal Charge Drive}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/blissful-restraint.png} tip={Blissful Restraint}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/floran-heros-will.png} tip={Floran Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Reinforced Battle Arts, Guardbreak Arts and Boss Rush Arts
  • Enhanced Specter Healing and Enhanced Specter State

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
Tertiary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first and so on
  • 6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

extraContent.title: Specter Form
extraContent.content:
Ark has two forms, Lef Form and Specter Form which he can freely transform between. However, in 1st Job, you will have no control over when you transform. As you progress the story and reach 2nd Job, you unlock the skill Master Corruption that allows you to switch between forms

Specter Form is only a temporary boost and the time is limited. Ark has a special gauge that indicates how long you can stay in Specter Form. This gauge slowly regenerates while in Lef Form. While in Specter Form, certain skills are swapped. These skills will share Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot. Below is a list of all Lef and Specter skill counterparts:

  • / Mystic Leap & Instinctual Leap (1st Job)
  • / Scarlet Charge Drive & Grievous Wound (2nd Job)
  • Unstoppable Impulse & Tenacious Instinct (2nd Job)
  • / Gust Charge Drive & Insatiable Hunger (3rd Job)
  • / Abyssal Charge Drive & Unbridled Chaos (4th Job)

Linking Skills:

Ark can link any attack to Basic Charge Drive or Endless Dream, in their respective forms. Linking attacks will remove any end animation delays and prevent the linked attack used from displacing you. In 4th Job, you unlock a skill called Battle Frenzy that makes linking skills easier with each successful linked attack

primary.name: Contact Caravan
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100, gains a buff for 300 sec
Ferret: Active Cooldowns shortened by 10% (except skills that ignore cooldown resets)
Salvo: Damage increases by 8%
Mar: EXP +4%
Zippy: Applies Ferret, Salvo, and Mar's buffs at the same time at half strength
Cooldown: 600 sec
primary.desc: When used, receive 1 of 4 possible buffs
details: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/contact-caravan-ferret.png} tip={Contact Caravan - Ferret (Beginner Skill)}> [Ferret]: Reduces any active cooldowns by a short amount
<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/contact-caravan-salvo.png} tip={Contact Caravan - Salvo (Beginner Skill)}> [Salvo]: Increases your %Damage
<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/contact-caravan-mar.png} tip={Contact Caravan - Mar (Beginner Skill)}> [Mar]: Increases %EXP gained

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/contact-caravan-zippy.png} tip={Contact Caravan - Zippy (Beginner Skill)}> [Zippy]: Applies all the buffs at the same time at half strength
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the message pop-up when casting
Unlocked from completing Ark Storyline
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Magic Conversion
primary.shortDesc: 25% of your equipment's Magic ATT is converted to Attack Power, excluding your weapon. Any set effects do not apply. Only converts up to 10% of your weapon's base Attack Power.

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/219/Who%27s_the_true_victor%3F} title={"Who's the true victor?"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Specter State
primary.shortDesc:
Activate Specter State after using Specter skills multiple times.
If you use the last of your Spectra to maintain Specter State, you won't be able to recover it for 20 sec, even in Flora State
Specter State
Skills: changed and enhanced, Attack Power: +30, Knockback Resistance: +100%
primary.desc: After using enough Specter skills, you will be forced into Specter Mode
details: While in Specter Mode, gain 100% Knockback Resistance and flat Attack
In 2nd Job, completing the Ark Storyline unlocks a skill that allows you to freely transform
When your Specter gauge fully depletes, you will not be able to regenerate it for a few seconds

primary.name: Ominous Nightmare
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 30, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nCooldown: 2 sec
primary.desc: Swipe forward with your specter arm

primary.name: Ominous Dream
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6\nRecovers 1% of Max HP when the attack hits\nNo cooldown
primary.desc: Swipe forward with your specter arm
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/ominous-nightmare.png} tip={Ominous Nightmare (1st Job)}>
Restores some %Max HP if attack hits

primary.name: Basic Charge Drive
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3\nBasic Cast: Damage: 50%, Number of Basic Casts: 2, Number of Attacks: 1\nBasic Buff : Speed: + 20 when Basic Cast hits, Knockback Resistance: +50% when Basic Cast hits, Duration: 60 sec
primary.desc: Swipe forward and charge a Spell Bullet
details: [Spell Bullet]: Fires a homing bullet
<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/basic-buff.png} tip={Basic Cast (1st Job)}> [Spell Bullet Buff]: Provides Movement Speed and %Knockback Resistance buff

primary.name: Spell Bullets
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Shoot all charged spells at once like bullets.\nDamage +5% for every extra bullet\nMax Bullets: 5
primary.desc: Fire all Spell Bullets created from "Charge Drive" skills
details: Each time a "Charge Drive" skill hits an enemy, it charges one Spell Bullet with a unique effect<bp_Bullets are displayed as small diamonds on the Specter gauge_>
If a bullet hits an enemy, gain a buff depending on the "Charge Drive" skill
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Auto Use ON/OFF

primary.name: Mystic Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>

primary.name: Instinctual Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>
Holding the Down Arrow Key while in the air allows you to fly slowly<bp_Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF this function_>
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/mystic-leap.png} tip={Mystic Leap (1st Job)}>
Horizontal jump can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Mystic Arts Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Speed: +27, Max Speed: +25, Jump: +20, Knockback Resistance: +50%, Defense: +250

primary.name: Master Corruption
primary.shortDesc: Switch to Specter State\nCooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: Transform into <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/specter-state.png} tip={Specter State (1st Job)}> Specter Mode
details: The Specter gauge is slowly consumed while in Specter mode and slowly regenerates in Lef mode
Unlocked by completing Ark storyline

primary.name: Scarlet Charge Drive
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 25, Damage: 80%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
Generates flames upon charging. Damage: 80%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3
Cooldown: 3 sec
Scarlet Cast: Damage: 90% Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 5
Scarlet Buff: Attack Power: +30 and Critical Rate +20% when Scarlet Buff hits. Duration: 60 sec
primary.desc: Dash forward leaving behind a trail of fire and charges a Spell Bullet
details: [Spell Bullet]: Fire a bullet that damages enemies in an area
<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/scarlet-buff.png} tip={Scarlet Cast (2nd Job)}> [Spell Bullet Buff]: Increases %Crit Rate and grants flat Attack

primary.name: Grievous Wound
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 6\nRecovers 2% of Max HP when the attack hits\nCooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: Dash forward damaging enemies you pass through
details: Restores some %Max HP if attack hits
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/scarlet-charge-drive.png} tip={Scarlet Charge Drive (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Unstoppable Impulse
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 70, Damage: 110%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Max Consecutive Use: 2 times\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Dash diagonally damaging enemies you pass through
details: Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will cause you to dash downwards
Can be used twice in a row
If linked, the skill will activate horizontally instead without dashing

primary.name: Tenacious Instinct
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 135%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Max Consecutive Use: 2 times\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Dash diagonally damaging enemies you pass through
details: Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will cause you to dash downwards
Can be used twice in a row
If linked, the skill will activate horizontally instead without dashing
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/unstoppable-impulse.png} tip={Unstoppable Impulse (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Impending Death
primary.shortDesc: Generates Abyssal Aura when attacking. Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Abyssal Aura: 6\nThe strength of the Abyssal Aura is based on the number of enemies nearby.
primary.desc: While toggled, successful attacks create homing orbs in Specter Mode
details: Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Knuckle Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Knuckle Attack Speed increased for 200 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Knuckle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +50%, Attack Power +20, Final Damage: +5%

primary.name: Initiate Fusion
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Max MP: +20%, Critical Rate: +5%\nDamage Taken: -30%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: STR +60

primary.name: Vivid Nightmare
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 50, Damage: 270%, Number of Attacks: 6, Enemies Hit: 6\nCooldown: 2 sec
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Vivid Dream
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 280%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6\nRecovers 1% of Max HP when the attack hits\nNo cooldown
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/vivid-nightmare.png} tip={Vivid Nightmare (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Gust Charge Drive
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Damage: 205%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6
Cooldown: 5 sec
Gust Cast: Pulls enemies nearby and does 200% damage. Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 4
Gust Buff
Duration: 60 sec when Gust Cast hits, Attack Speed: +1, Avoidability: +25%
primary.desc: Dive downwards and charges a Spell Bullet
details: Can only be used in the air or on the ground by linking with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/basic-charge-drive.png} tip={Basic Charge Drive (1st Job)}>
[Spell Bullet]: Fire a bullet that pulls in nearby enemies
<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/gust-buff.png} tip={Gust Cast (3rd Job)}> [Spell Bullet Buff]: Increases Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and %Avoidability

primary.name: Insatiable Hunger
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 300%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 7\nRecovers 5% of Max HP when the attack hits\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Leap forward damaging enemies in front of you
details: Restores some %Max HP if attack hits
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/gust-charge-drive.png} tip={Gust Charge Drive (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Creeping Terror
primary.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 2% of Max HP per 0.5 sec while holding the key, Max Duration: 5 sec, Invincible while holding down the key
Boundless Horror
Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 15
Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Burrow into the ground and emerge as a gigantic Specter
details: While held, you will remain invincible and burrowed
Upon emerging, you will be shifted into Specter Form
Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Vengeful Hate
primary.shortDesc:
20% chance to leave Abyssal Mark when Impending Death hits. Activates marks within a set range, dealing 370% damage to up to 8 enemies 6 times for every activated mark.
Max Mark Creation: 12, Max Duration: 20 sec
Max Mark Activation Limit for Auto Mode: 8
Cooldown: 12 sec
primary.desc: Successful attacks from <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/impending-death.png} tip={Impending Death (2nd Job)}> have a chance to create blades that fly towards you while damaging enemies when skill is used
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect and cooldown resets
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Auto Use ON/OFF

primary.name: Mystic Arts Training
primary.shortDesc: Basic Charge Drive Damage: +260%p, Basic Cast Damage: +160%p, Scarlet Charge Drive and Flame Damage: +100%p, Scarlet Cast Damage: +90%p

primary.name: Innate Arts Training
primary.shortDesc: Grievous Wound: +160%p, Unstoppable Impulse / Tenacious Instinct Damage: +150%p, Impending Death Damage: +145%p

primary.name: Advanced Fusion
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +12%, Critical Rate: +20%, Status Resistance: +40, All Elemental Resistance: +16%

primary.name: Endless Nightmare
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 85, Damage: 440%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nCooldown: 2 sec
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Endless Dream
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 445%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6\nRecovers 1% of Max HP when the attack hits\nNo cooldown
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/endless-nightmare.png} tip={Endless Nightmare (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Abyssal Charge Drive
primary.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 95, MP Cost: 65
Damage: 340%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 4, Abyssal Magic: 410%, Abyssal Magic Max Enemies Hit: 8, Abyssal Magic Number of Attacks: 6
Cooldown: 9 sec
Abyssal Cast : Creates Abyssal Cast when used. Abyssal Cast Duration: 3 sec, Abyssal Cast Max Enemies Hit: 8, Abyssal Cast Damage: 70%, Abyssal Cast Number of Attacks: 2
Abyssal Buff : Activates when Abyssal Cast hits. Duration: 60 sec. Damage: 20%, Boss Damage: +30%, Ignore Defense +20%
primary.desc: A giant specter hand slams into the ground damaging nearby enemies and charges a Spell Bullet
details: While casting, you cannot be knocked back
[Spell Bullet]: Fire a bullet that leaves a lingering damaging field
<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/abyssal-buff.png} tip={Abyssal Cast (4th Job)}> [Spell Bullet Buff]: Increases %Damage, %Boss Damage, and %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Unbridled Chaos
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 440%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 12\nRecovers 3% of Max HP when the attack hits\nCooldown: 9 sec
primary.desc: Violently dash forward dealing damage to enemies
details: Restores some %Max HP if attack hits
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot as <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/abyssal-charge-drive.png} tip={Abyssal Charge Drive (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Blissful Restraint
primary.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 1100, Damage: 600%, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Number of Attacks: 6. Bind Duration: 10 sec, Bind duration can increase up to 100% based on the damage inflicted with this skill.
Afterward
Duration: 9 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 3
When the skill ends:
Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 8
Cooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: Dash towards a nearby enemy and bind them
details: Attack prioritizes enemy with the highest Max HP
When used, you will be shifted into Specter Form
Unaffected by Damage Reflect, cooldown resets, and does not trigger <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/impending-death.png} tip={Impending Death (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Hero of the Flora
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, creates a Flora emblem\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Floran Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Knuckle Expert
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +30%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery and Attack provided
Now increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Advanced Mystic Arts
primary.shortDesc: Basic Charge Drive Damage: +250%p, Basic Cast Damage: +160%p, Scarlet Charge Drive and Flame Damage: +170%p, Scarlet Cast Damage: +40%p, Gust Charge Drive Damage: +195%p, Gust Cast Damage: +30%p

primary.name: Advanced Innate Arts
primary.shortDesc: Grievous Wound: +180%p, Unstoppable Impulse/Tenacious Instinct Damage: +175%p, Impending Death Damage: +115%p, Insatiable Hunger Damage: +190%p, Boundless Horror Damage: +890%p, Vengeful Hate Damage: +110%p

primary.name: Complete Fusion
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +40, Critical Rate: +10%, Ignore Defense: +30%, Boss Damage: +30%\nDamage Taken: -20%, Knockback Resistance: +50%

primary.name: Battle Frenzy
primary.shortDesc: Activated when you connect Basic Charge Drive or Endless Dream with other skills. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration: 20 sec\nHigher levels of this skill allow you to link skills with Basic Charge Drive and Endless Dream faster.\nPermanently increases Final Damage by 20%.
primary.desc: Whenever you link an attack with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/basic-charge-drive.png} tip={Basic Charge Drive (1st Job)}> or <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/ominous-dream.png} tip={Ominous Dream (4th Job)}>, gain stacks that make it easier to link further skills
details: Additionally, permanently increases %Final Damage

hyperPassive.name: Reinforced Battle Arts
details: Increases pre-5th job attack's %Damage (except for <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/spell-bullets.png} tip={Spell Bullets (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/impending-death.png} tip={Impending Death (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/vengeful-hate.png} tip={Vengeful Hate (3rd Job)}>)

hyperPassive.name: Guardbreak Arts
details: Increases pre-5th job attack's %Ignore DEF (except for <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/spell-bullets.png} tip={Spell Bullets (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/impending-death.png} tip={Impending Death (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/vengeful-hate.png} tip={Vengeful Hate (3rd Job)}>)

hyperPassive.name: Boss Rush Arts
details: Increases pre-5th job attack's %Boss Damage (except for <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/spell-bullets.png} tip={Spell Bullets (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/impending-death.png} tip={Impending Death (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/vengeful-hate.png} tip={Vengeful Hate (3rd Job)}>)

hyperPassive.name: Incredibly Tenacious Instinct
details: Increases the number of times <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/unstoppable-impulse.png} tip={Unstoppable Impulse (2nd Job)}> can be used

hyperPassive.name: Enhanced Spectra Healing
details: Increases the rate at which your Specter gauge regenerates

hyperPassive.name: Enhanced Specter State
details: You will be completely immune to knockbacks in Specter Form

hyperPassive.name: Advanced Specter State
details: Using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/master-corruption.png} tip={Master Corruption (2nd Job)}> during an attack will cancel that attack and shift you into Specter Form

Can trigger <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/battle-frenzy.png} tip={Battle Frenzy (4th Job)}> when used during <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/basic-charge-drive.png} tip={Basic Charge Drive (1st Job)}>

hyperActive.name: Charge Spell Amplifier
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Duration: 60 sec
Charge Spell buff applied to party members who are within range when it activates. Charge Spell duration is the remaining time of Charge Spell Amplification.
Effect is doubled for yourself while Charge Spell Amplification lasts.
Cooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: While active, Bullet Spell buffs are also applied to party members and doubled effects for yourself

hyperActive.name: Endless Agony
hyperActive.shortDesc: Hold the key to continue the attack. Max Enemies Hit: 5, Max Duration: 3 sec, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 3. An Abyssal Guard is summoned when the key is released or when the skill ends.\nAbyssal Guard: activates Chase Cut 5 times, dealing 420% damage 12 times to 12 enemies, HP Recovery when the attack hits: 20% of Max HP\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: While held, launch a barrage of spears forward before dealing a final attack
details: When used, you will be shifted into Specter Form
Final attack restores some %Max HP and ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and cooldown resets

hyperActive.name: Divine Wrath
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Flora class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Abyssal Recall
fifthMain.shortDesc:
You link with the Abyssal Source the moment the skill is activated. You don't consume Spectra for 18 sec while in Specter State.
While the Abyssal is active, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 880%, Number of Attacks: 6, Invincible while attacking
When attack ends, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1815%, Number of Attacks: 12, Number of Explosions: 6
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Shift into Specter Form and unleash a devastating attack before dealing an explosive final attack
details: Pressing the Skill Key again while the attack is active, cancels the attack early and activates the final attack
After the attack, you will not consume any Specter resource for a short period
You are invincible while the attack is active
Does not trigger <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/impending-death.png} tip={Impending Death (2nd Job)}>
Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
[Note]: Female Arks do not have a cutscene animation, just the attack animation

fifthMain.name: Infinity Spell
fifthMain.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 8% of Max HP
Duration: 50 sec
Flora State: When spell is charged, Basic Cast is charged as much as the remaining max spell charge limit.
Specter State: When Impending Death activates, an additional 3 Abyssal Auras are created
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, automatically grants max charges of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/basic-buff.png} tip={Basic Charge Drive (1st Job)}> Basic Spell Bullet when attacking and creates more <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/impending-death.png} tip={Impending Death (2nd Job)}> orbs
details: Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

fifthMain.name: Devious Nightmare
fifthMain.shortDesc: Activates a spectral energy when Endless Nightmare is used. Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1100%, Number of Attacks: 12.\nCooldown: 10 sec\nWhen Charge Drive skills (with the exception of Basic Charge Drive) land successfully, the cooldown is reduced by 1 sec, an effect that is applied only once per skill.
fifthMain.desc: Periodically, when using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/endless-nightmare.png} tip={Endless Nightmare (4th Job)}>, a giant Specter claw lashes out
details: Upon landing a successful Charge Drive skill (except <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/basic-charge-drive.png} tip={Basic Charge Drive (1st Job)}> and only once per skill), the cooldown is reduced
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Devious Dream
fifthMain.shortDesc: Activates a spectral energy when Endless Dream is used. Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1320%, Number of Attacks: 12\nCooldown: 10 sec\nWhen Grievous Wound/Tenacious Instinct/Insatiable Hunger/Boundless Horror/Unbridled Chaos land successfully, the cooldown is reduced by 1 sec, an effect that is applied only once per skill.
fifthMain.desc: Periodically, when using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/endless-dream.png} tip={Endless Dream (4th Job)}>, a giant Specter claw lashes out
details: Upon landing a successful Specter Form attack (only once per skill), the cooldown is reduced
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Endlessly Starving Beast
fifthMain.shortDesc: HP Cost: 500. Initiates a countdown to the Beast's rampage, each strike in which hits up to 12 enemies, for 1045% damage, 12 time(s). The Beast strikes 20 time(s) in all.\nIf an attack skill that utilizes Specter's Force hit successfully, the Beast's rampage will begin 0.6 sec sooner. Only 30% applied for consecutive-type skills, or for certain other skills.\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon a giant specter that burrows in the ground before launching up for a giant attack
details: Using a Specter attack will increase the speed at which the specter erupts from the ground
When used, you will be shifted into Specter Form
Unaffected by Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/basic-charge-drive.png} tip={Overcharge Drive (Basic Charge Drive) (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/scarlet-charge-drive.png} tip={Scarlet Charge Drive and Grievous Wound (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/gust-charge-drive.png} tip={Gust Charge Drive and Insatiable Hunger (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/abyssal-charge-drive.png} tip={Abyssal Charge Drive and Unbridled Chaos (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Basic Charge Drive
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 900%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 3\nBasic Cast: Damage: 595%, Number of Basic Casts: 2, Number of Attacks: 1\nBasic Buff : Speed: + 20 when Basic Cast hits, Knockback Resistance: +50% when Basic Cast hits, Duration: 60 sec
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Scarlet Charge Drive
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 45, Damage: 565%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 3
Generates flames upon charging. Damage: 565%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 3
Cooldown: 3 sec
Scarlet Cast: Damage: 355% Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 5
Scarlet Buff: Attack Power: +30 and Critical Rate +20% when Scarlet Buff hits. Duration: 60 sec
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Gust Charge Drive
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 45, Damage: 645%, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Number of Attacks: 6
Cooldown: 5 sec
Gust Cast: Pulls enemies nearby and does 370% damage. Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 4
Gust Buff
Duration: 60 sec when Gust Cast hits, Attack Speed: +1, Avoidability: +25%
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Abyssal Charge Drive
masteryCore.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 110, MP Cost: 85
Damage: 550%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 4, Abyssal Magic: 660%, Abyssal Magic Max Enemies Hit: 8, Abyssal Magic Number of Attacks: 6
Cooldown: 9 sec
Abyssal Cast : Creates Abyssal Cast when used. Abyssal Cast Duration: 3 sec, Abyssal Cast Max Enemies Hit: 8, Abyssal Cast Damage: 115%, Abyssal Cast Number of Attacks: 2
Abyssal Buff : Activates when Abyssal Cast hits. Duration: 60 sec. Damage: 20%, Boss Damage: +35%, Ignore Defense +20%
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: Awakened Abyss
masteryCore.shortDesc: Creates 10 spectral energy when you combo Basic Charge Drive with another skill to attack the enemy. When an attack hits in Specter State, the energy is consumed to create an abyssal blade that deals 1460% damage 3 times to all enemies that are hit.\nMax Spectral Energy Limit: 300\nWhen using Infinity Spell or Primordial Abyss, Additional Spectral Energy: 300
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/scarlet-charge-drive.png} tip={Scarlet Charge Drive and Grievous Wound (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/gust-charge-drive.png} tip={Gust Charge Drive and Insatiable Hunger (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/flora/ark/abyssal-charge-drive.png} tip={Abyssal Charge Drive and Unbridled Chaos (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Grievous Wound
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Damage: 990%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 6
Recovers 2% of Max HP when the attack hits
Cooldown: 3 sec
[Passive Effect: Vengeful Hate Damage: +420%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Insatiable Hunger
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Damage: 980%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 7
Recovers 5% of Max HP when the attack hits
Cooldown: 5 sec
[Passive Effect: Unstoppable Impulse, Tenacious Instinct Damage: +250%p]
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Unbridled Chaos
masteryCore.shortDesc: Damage: 880%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attack: 12\nRecovers 3% of Max HP when the attack hits\nCooldown: 9 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Primordial Abyss
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1500, invincible during casting\nNumber of Source Erosions: 68, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1101%, Number of Attacks: 14. Number of Abyssal Grips: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1730%, Duration: 30 sec\nCooldown: 360 sec

meta: Ark is a STR pirate class part of the Flora class group. He uses his Specter arm combined with Lef martial arts to defeat enemies. Ark can transform into a Specter at will for a short period to dish out high damage with high mobility. He has REALLY strong mobbing potential. His bossing capabilities are just as good but require a bit of mechanics
